PostgreSQL.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')

MySQL.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'performance_schema', 'sys')

MariaDB.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'performance_schema', 'sys')

Oracle.identity_query: SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP as current_timestamp FROM dual
Oracle.schema_query: SELECT owner, table_name FROM all_tables WHERE owner NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM')
Oracle.database_info_query: SELECT banner as database_version FROM v$version WHERE rownum = 1

SQL Server.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('sys', 'INFORMATION_SCHEMA')

SQLite.schema_query: SELECT name as table_name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%'

H2.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('INFORMATION_SCHEMA', 'PUBLIC')

DB2 LUW.identity_query: SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as current_timestamp FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
DB2 LUW.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM syscat.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSCAT', 'SYSTOOLS')
DB2 LUW.database_info_query: SELECT service_level as database_version FROM sysibm.sysversions

DB2 z/OS.identity_query: SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as current_timestamp FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
DB2 z/OS.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM syscat.tables WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSCAT', 'SYSTOOLS')
DB2 z/OS.database_info_query: SELECT service_level as database_version FROM sysibm.sysversions

DB2 for i.identity_query: SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as current_timestamp FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
DB2 for i.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_schema NOT IN ('QSYS', 'QSYS2', 'QSYSIBM')

Example Custom DB2.identity_query: SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as current_timestamp FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
Example Custom DB2.schema_query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM syscat.tables WHERE table_schema = 'MYAPP'
Example Custom DB2.database_info_query: SELECT service_level as database_version FROM sysibm.sysversions
